title: Low Poly Shooter Pack v6.0
description: Advanced shooter pack with a cool low poly style and a focus on polished mechanics and high-quality animations. Built to be used as a starting point for your game projects, for prototyping or for learning!
longDescription:
Note: A good understanding of Blueprints will help you use the project in a more effective manner, but it is not a requirement.


Resources

Version 6.0 Update Showcase Video / Animation Showcase / Demo (Windows 64-bit) / Discord Server / Changelog / Free Sample


Resources - Art Pack Integration

Low Poly Animated - Modern Guns Pack / Integration Gameplay Video / Demo (Windows 64-bit)


The Low Poly Shooter Pack is an out-of-the-box solution — jam-packed with polished mechanics and high-quality animations — that will serve as a fantastic foundation for whatever kind of shooter game you want to create.


Here’s What Make This Pack Awesome:


✅ Saves you hundreds of hours of VFX, 3D Modeling, Animation or Programming. We’ve done all the heavy lifting for you.


✅ Crazy amounts of documentation. We’ve got dozens of pages of easy-to-follow documentation, along with videos explaining the code, to help you make FPS games with ease.


✅ Easily make multiplayer games. The entire pack is fully-replicated and ready to multi-play (pun intended).


✅ Fully compatible with all versions of Unreal Engine from 4.26, and all the way to the latest 5.4 release.


✅ The Blender Source Files for all the weapons are included. Meaning you can easily modify the models/rigs as needed for your game (easy-to-follow guides are available for this too!)


✅ Perfect for both beginners and professional game developers, you’ll find a use for this pack — be it learning from it, using it to prototype your ideas or making a full game from it, this is for you.


Here’s Everything You Get:


➡️ 18 Weapon Models — including assault rifles, handguns, shotguns, SMGs, snipers, launchers.


➡️ 240+ Weapon Materials — from camos to carbon fibers, cool patterns and more!


➡️ 170+ Character Materials — so you can create unique looks for your game characters.


➡️ Animations for Every Action — easily customizable, highly-polished animations for reloading, shooting, inspecting, throwing, movement, and more!


➡️ Blender Source Files — easily modify the included gun models and rigs for your game.


➡️ Fully Replicated — meaning you’re all set to make a multiplayer game.


➡️ AI Enemies That Fight Back — highly customizable with built-in attacking, pathfinding, roaming, and chasing.


➡️ Health, Death & Respawning — all these essential functions of a shooter game are ready-to-use out of the box.


➡️ First & Third Person Modes (Fully-Animated!) — all assets are ready for first and third person gameplay that can be switched between at the press of a button.


➡️ Weapon Pickups & Inventory — easily pick and drop weapons from your character’s inventory throughout your levels.


➡️ Explosive Props — from barrels to gas tanks that will create epic explosions when shot.


➡️ Exciting VFX — including muzzle flashes, smoke, flames, bullet trails, bullet impacts, and more!


➡️ Fully Customizable UI and HUD — customize your UI and HUD with a whole assortment of built-in icons.


What People Are Saying About The Low Poly Shooter Pack:


⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ “The best FPS pack on the store right now” by DadBodNoKids

“This pack easily has the best weapons and animations I've come across on the Unreal Marketplace. The creators are also extremely active and responsive in the Discord server, answering questions and solving problems very quickly. I'm excited to see what they have in store for the next update!”


⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ “Absolutely Amazing!!!! + Devs are super responsive and helpful!!!” by L1QUIDSM0K3

“I brought this pack a week ago and could not be happier. Im very new to ue5 and originaly i thought i'd get this pack cause the animations and low poly weapons look awsome and where perfect for my project... but ive also been using it as a cross reference to see how certain things are put together. ive relly been learning alot from it so could'nt recommend it enough. Once verified if you run into any problems the discord community are also so friendly and helpful. shout out to the devs and community ya'll are legends.”


⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ “Does not disappoint!” by dng_phm_david

“I've been waiting on this for months hoping that the next update would include AI. The AI is good, but is not set up currently to attack on sight. I'm working on that and have it working pretty well so far like in this example that also uses the Low Poly Animated Modern Guns Pack. Highly recommend this platform.”


What People are Making:

Here’s just a couple of examples of what people are already making with the Low Poly Shooter Pack:

  • "Shooting to the beat with rhythm weapons | DevLog 3" by @VoidHeat
  • "Stylish Guards DevTest 02" by @beyondskystudios4271


You're Covered By Our 30-Day Money Back Guarantee


If you’re still unsure whether the Low Poly Shooter Pack is right for you, why not take it for a risk-free test drive?


When you download the pack today, you’re covered by our 30-day, 100% money back guarantee, so there’s no risk to you.


Try it out for 30 days…


You’ll either be blown away by how this pack makes creating an awesome shooter game even easier than ever before… or you’ll get 100% of your money back.


That’s how confident we are that you’ll absolutely love this.


So what are you waiting for?


Latest Update


Here’s content that we just added to the asset recently with update v6.0:


🆕 Sliding Movement


🆕 Unarmed Combat Animations


🆕 Screen Damage Effects


🆕 Multiplayer Optimizations
